title: What Are Some Funny Ways to Ask Someone Out on a Date?

steps.title: Throw it back to elementary school with a note expressing your feelings.
steps.content: Throw it back to elementary school with a note expressing your feelings. Then write, “Do you like me? Circle Yes or No.” Hopefully, they’ll circle yes, and you can start planning your date! This is also a super low-pressure way to ask someone out. If they aren’t feeling it, they can just circle no, and you can both move on.

steps.title: Borrow some fun chalk colors from your little sibling.
steps.content: Borrow some fun chalk colors from your little sibling. Write, “Will you go out with me?” in huge letters outside your potential date’s house, then tell them to come outside. They’ll be so surprised, they’ll probably say yes! [1] X Research source Bonus points if you add a few fun chalk drawings around your question. If you don’t want to go to your crush’s house, you could write it in front of your own and then invite them over.

steps.title: Buy a cake or a huge cookie from a bakery.
steps.content: Buy a cake or a huge cookie from a bakery. Have them write “Will you go on a date with me?” in frosting on the top of the treat, then hand it to your potential date. This is a great option for anyone with a sweet tooth. [2] X Research source If your date isn’t a fan of treats, you might want to go with a different option. If you have the baking skills, you could even whip something up yourself instead of buying it pre-made.

steps.title: Make up a song expressing your feelings.
steps.content: Make up a song expressing your feelings. At the end, ask “will you go on a date with me?” Record yourself signing, then send the video via text or DM to your potential date. If they say yes, you can keep the video around forever as a fond memory. If you don’t want to make up a song, you could always sing a classic love song and add your question at the end. If singing isn’t your thing, try dancing or lip syncing instead.

steps.title: Come up with 2 or 3 things you guys could do on your date.
steps.content: Come up with 2 or 3 things you guys could do on your date. Write them down, then hand your crush the note and have them circle their favorite option. When they give the note back to you, start planning your date! Your options could be things like: going to a museum, eating a home-cooked meal, going out to a fancy restaurant, spending a night star-gazing, or going on a nature walk. Reader Poll: We asked 2380 wikiHow readers about which first date they’d like to go on the most, and only 8% said going rock climbing . [Take Poll] So, suggesting a more casual activity, like grabbing dinner or seeing a show, might be more fun for your date.

steps.title: If you can’t see your crush in person, try asking them over text.
steps.content: If you can’t see your crush in person, try asking them over text. Pick out a funny gif that says, “wanna go out?” or “will you be mine?” Text it to them with a few heart emojis to get your point across. [3] X Research source If they say yes, you can start planning your date! Pick out a time and a place to meet up in person. Asking someone out over text isn’t ideal, but it’s great if you live far away or you can’t see each other for a while.

steps.title: Make your potential date giggle as you ask them out.
steps.content: Make your potential date giggle as you ask them out. Try something with a play on words to really get them going. You could try lines like: [4] X Research source “Do you like coffee? Because I like you a latte.” “Do you have a bandaid? I scraped my knee falling for you.” “Are you Australian? Because you meet all of my koala-fications.”

steps.title: No one can resist the cheesy goodness of a pizza.
steps.content: No one can resist the cheesy goodness of a pizza. Order a fresh pie, then write “Will you go out with me, or is this too cheesy?” on the box before handing it to your potential date. When they open it up, they’ll get a deliciously tasty surprise. If they say yes, your first date can be enjoying the pizza that just came to the door.

steps.title: Hire someone to show up to their house and sing about them.
steps.content: Hire someone to show up to their house and sing about them. At the end of their song, the telegram can ask, “Will you go out with ___?” If they say yes, it will be a question they’ll never forget! Pick a time when you and your potential will be together, like when you’re hanging out at their house or you’re out at a restaurant.

steps.title: If your potential date always asks for a piece, it’s the perfect opportunity.
steps.content: If your potential date always asks for a piece, it’s the perfect opportunity. Unwrap a piece of gum and write, “Will you go out with me?” on the wrapper. Put it back around the stick of gum, then offer it to them the next time you see each other. [5] X Research source If you’re worried about your potential date picking the wrong piece of gum, make sure it’s the last one in the pack.

steps.title: If you’re both competitive, use that to your advantage.
steps.content: If you’re both competitive, use that to your advantage. Say something like, “I bet you can’t come up with a better date idea than me.” When they explain their idea, you can concede and say something like, “Okay, you win. What time should I pick you up?” [6] X Research source This is a pretty bold option, so you should only use this one if you’re 99% sure your potential date is interested in you.
